findings.title: M2: Duplicating tokenIds
findings.description: Duplicating tokenIds can cause precision loss due to XOR operation in _flipBits function and OR operation in _nonblockingLzReceive function, leading to creation of new tokenIds.

findings.title: I3: For-loop style
findings.description: The contract uses a for-loop style that can be optimized for gas efficiency and improved code readability.

findings.title: I4: Unnecessary variables creation
findings.description: Unnecessary variable creations are found in DistributeONFT721.sol contract which can be optimized for gas efficiency and code style.
